name: Spongebob Squarepants: The Lost Krabby Patty
name_original: Spongebob Squarepants: The Lost Krabby Patty
description:
The Krusy Krab is being renovated by Mr.Krabs into a brand new sparkly one and Mr Krabs gave the secret formula to Spongebob to keep while renovations happen.

But at one night spongebob and patrick binge eat Krabby Patties at 3am and after going to bed plankton steals one of the Krabby Patties and is now on the loose catch him before he reaches the chum bucket or the world will never be the same
